title: WeWow Day 2: Let's Meet Entrepreneur, Madam CJ Walker
description:
Mindy and Guy Raz are back on the road in the Wowmobile! Today they're finishing up an episode of one of their favorite podcasts, "Who, When Wow!" Join Mindy and Guy Raz as they learn about the amazing Madam CJ Walker who WOWed the world with her hair care products for Black women! Don't forget to make your own soap like Mindy and Guy Raz. Head to tinkercast.com/wewow for more!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
